verses.verse: In that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall this <S%H2088><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> be sung <S%H7891><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%> We have a strong <S%H5797><s%> city; <S%H5892><s%> salvation <S%H3444><s%> will God appoint <S%H7896><s%> for walls <S%H2346><s%> and bulwarks. <S%H2426><s%>
Open <S%H6605><s%> ye the gates, <S%H8179><s%> that the righteous <S%H6662><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> which keepeth <S%H8104><s%> the truth <S%H529><s%> may enter in. <S%H935><s%>
Thou wilt keep <S%H5341><s%> him in perfect peace, <S%H7965><s%> <S%H7965><s%> whose mind <S%H3336><s%> is stayed <S%H5564><s%> on thee: because <S%H3588><s%> he trusteth <S%H982><s%> in thee.

Trust <S%H982><s%> ye in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> forever: <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5703><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> in the LORD <S%H3050><s%> JEHOVAH <S%H3068><s%> is everlasting <S%H5769><s%> strength: <S%H6697><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> he bringeth down <S%H7817><s%> them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> on high; <S%H4791><s%> the lofty <S%H7682><s%> city, <S%H7151><s%> he layeth it low; <S%H8213><s%> he layeth it low, <S%H8213><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> the ground; <S%H776><s%> he bringeth <S%H5060><s%> it even to <S%H5704><s%> the dust. <S%H6083><s%>
The foot <S%H7272><s%> shall tread it down, <S%H7429><s%> even the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the poor, <S%H6041><s%> and the steps <S%H6471><s%> of the needy. <S%H1800><s%>
The way <S%H734><s%> of the just <S%H6662><s%> is uprightness: <S%H4339><s%> thou, most upright, <S%H3477><s%> dost weigh <S%H6424><s%> the path <S%H4570><s%> of the just. <S%H6662><s%>

Yea, <S%H637><s%> in the way <S%H734><s%> of thy judgments, <S%H4941><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> have we waited <S%H6960><s%> for thee; the desire <S%H8378><s%> of our soul <S%H5315><s%> is to thy name, <S%H8034><s%> and to the remembrance <S%H2143><s%> of thee.

With my soul <S%H5315><s%> have I desired <S%H183><s%> thee in the night; <S%H3915><s%> yea, <S%H637><s%> with my spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> me will I seek thee early: <S%H7836><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> when <S%H834><s%> thy judgments <S%H4941><s%> are in the earth, <S%H776><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> will learn <S%H3925><s%> righteousness. <S%H6664><s%>

Let favor be showed <S%H2603><s%> to the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> yet will he not <S%H1077><s%> learn <S%H3925><s%> righteousness: <S%H6664><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of uprightness <S%H5229><s%> will he deal unjustly, <S%H5765><s%> and will not <S%H1077><s%> behold <S%H7200><s%> the majesty <S%H1348><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when thy hand <S%H3027><s%> is lifted up, <S%H5375><s%> they will not <S%H1077><s%> see: <S%H2372><s%> but they shall see, <S%H2372><s%> and be ashamed <S%H954><s%> for their envy <S%H7068><s%> at the people; <S%H5971><s%> yea, <S%H637><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> of thine enemies <S%H6862><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> them.
LORD, <S%H3068><s%> thou wilt ordain <S%H8239><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> for us: for <S%H3588><s%> thou also <S%H1571><s%> hast wrought <S%H6466><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> our works <S%H4639><s%> in us.

O LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> other lords <S%H113><s%> beside <S%H2108><s%> thee have had dominion <S%H1166><s%> over us: but by thee only <S%H905><s%> will we make mention <S%H2142><s%> of thy name. <S%H8034><s%>

They are dead, <S%H4191><s%> they shall not <S%H1077><s%> live; <S%H2421><s%> they are deceased, <S%H7496><s%> they shall not <S%H1077><s%> rise: <S%H6965><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> hast thou visited <S%H6485><s%> and destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them, and made all <S%H3605><s%> their memory <S%H2143><s%> to perish. <S%H6><s%>

Thou hast increased <S%H3254><s%> the nation, <S%H1471><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> thou hast increased <S%H3254><s%> the nation: <S%H1471><s%> thou art glorified: <S%H3513><s%> thou hadst removed it far <S%H7368><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> the ends <S%H7099><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
LORD, <S%H3068><s%> in trouble <S%H6862><s%> have they visited <S%H6485><s%> thee, they poured out <S%H6694><s%> a prayer <S%H3908><s%> when thy chastening <S%H4148><s%> was upon them.

Like as <S%H3644><s%> a woman with child, <S%H2030><s%> that draweth near <S%H7126><s%> the time of her delivery, <S%H3205><s%> is in pain, <S%H2342><s%> and crieth out <S%H2199><s%> in her pangs; <S%H2256><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> have we been <S%H1961><s%> in thy sight, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> O LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

We have been with child, <S%H2029><s%> we have been in pain, <S%H2342><s%> we have as it were <S%H3644><s%> brought forth <S%H3205><s%> wind; <S%H7307><s%> we have not <S%H1077><s%> wrought <S%H6213><s%> any deliverance <S%H3444><s%> in the earth; <S%H776><s%> neither <S%H1077><s%> have the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> fallen. <S%H5307><s%>

Thy dead <S%H4191><s%> men shall live, <S%H2421><s%> together with my dead body <S%H5038><s%> shall they arise. <S%H6965><s%> Awake <S%H6974><s%> and sing, <S%H7442><s%> ye that dwell <S%H7931><s%> in dust: <S%H6083><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thy dew <S%H2919><s%> is as the dew <S%H2919><s%> of herbs, <S%H219><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> shall cast out <S%H5307><s%> the dead. <S%H7496><s%>

Come, <S%H1980><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> enter <S%H935><s%> thou into thy chambers, <S%H2315><s%> and shut <S%H5462><s%> thy doors <S%H1817><s%> about <S%H1157><s%> thee: hide <S%H2247><s%> thyself as it were for a little <S%H4592><s%> moment, <S%H7281><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the indignation <S%H2195><s%> be overpast. <S%H5674><s%>

For, <S%H3588><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> cometh <S%H3318><s%> out of his place <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4725><s%> to punish <S%H6485><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for their iniquity: <S%H5771><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> also shall disclose <S%H1540><s%> <S%H853><s%> her blood, <S%H1818><s%> and shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> cover <S%H3680><s%> <S%H5921><s%> her slain. <S%H2026><s%>
